Identification of an issue, problem or diagnosis, or grouping of issues, problems or diagnoses, by name.

annotations.comment: Coding of the 'Problem/diagnosis name' with a terminology is preferred, where possible.

localizedDescriptions.en: Timing of the initial recognition of the issue, problem or diagnosis.

annotations.comment:
The 'Onset' data element is deliberately loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture the onset of a problem or the timing of a diagnosis. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. 

For example:
Date/time for the date of diagnosis. Interval of date/time for a period of time eg. between 1940 and 1942. Text for descriptions like 'Immediately after the operation', or 'Up to one week ago', 'Up to two weeks ago', 'Three weeks ago'. Duration for the individual's age at the onset. Interval of Duration for the approximate age of the individual at the time of onset.

annotations.comment: Use separate instances of this CLUSTER to differentiate between specific medications or groupings of medication.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat metotreksat']

children.name: Apakah terdapat riwayat penggunaan metotreksat?

localizedDescriptions.en: Name of medication or grouping of medication.

annotations.comment:
For example: 'alendronic acid', 'anti osteoporosis medications' or 'bisphosphonates'.
Coding of the 'Medication name' with a terminology is preferred, where possible.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat metotreksat']/items[at0021,'Apakah terdapat riwayat penggunaan metotreksat?']/value

children.name: Tanggal

localizedDescriptions.en: The onset, cessation or duration of use of the medication or grouping of medications.

annotations.comment:
The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when a medication was used. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example: 
Clone and rename the element in a template to 'Start' and 'Stopped' to record the Date/time when the individual started using a medication. Interval of date/time for a period of time eg. between 1940 and 1942. Text for descriptions like 'Immediately after the operation', or 'Up to one week ago', 'Up to two weeks ago', 'Three weeks ago'. Duration for the individual's age at the onset of duration OR the length of time during which the individual has been using the medication. Interval of Duration for the approximate age of the individual at the time of onset.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat metotreksat']/items[at0002,'Tanggal']/value

children.name: Selama

localizedDescriptions.en: The onset, cessation or duration of use of the medication or grouping of medications.

annotations.comment:
The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when a medication was used. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example: 
Clone and rename the element in a template to 'Start' and 'Stopped' to record the Date/time when the individual started using a medication. Interval of date/time for a period of time eg. between 1940 and 1942. Text for descriptions like 'Immediately after the operation', or 'Up to one week ago', 'Up to two weeks ago', 'Three weeks ago'. Duration for the individual's age at the onset of duration OR the length of time during which the individual has been using the medication. Interval of Duration for the approximate age of the individual at the time of onset.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat metotreksat']/items[at0002,'Selama']/value

children.name: Dosage

localizedDescriptions.en: The combination of a medication amount and administration timing for a single day, in the context of a medication order or medication management.

annotations.comment: For example: '2 tablets at 6pm' or '20 mg three times per day'. Please note: this cluster allows multiple occurrences to enable representation of a complete set of dose patterns for a single dose direction.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat metotreksat']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.dosage.v2]

children.name: Dosis kumulatif

localizedDescriptions.en: The amount of medication administered at one time.

annotations.comment: For example: 1 mg, 1.5 ml, 0.125 g; or 1-2 ml, 12.5-20.5 mg.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat metotreksat']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.dosage.v2]/items[at0144,'Dosis kumulatif']/value

children.name: Respons PASI

localizedDescriptions.en: Additional narrative about the specific medication question, not captured in other fields.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat secukinumab']/items[at0021,'Apakah terdapat riwayat penggunaan secukinumab?']/value

children.name: Tanggal

localizedDescriptions.en: The onset, cessation or duration of use of the medication or grouping of medications.

annotations.comment:
The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when a medication was used. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example: 
Clone and rename the element in a template to 'Start' and 'Stopped' to record the Date/time when the individual started using a medication. Interval of date/time for a period of time eg. between 1940 and 1942. Text for descriptions like 'Immediately after the operation', or 'Up to one week ago', 'Up to two weeks ago', 'Three weeks ago'. Duration for the individual's age at the onset of duration OR the length of time during which the individual has been using the medication. Interval of Duration for the approximate age of the individual at the time of onset.

The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when a medication was used. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example:

Interval of date/time for a period of time eg. between 1940 and 1942. Text for descriptions like 'Immediately after the operation', or 'Up to one week ago', 'Up to two weeks ago', 'Three weeks ago'. children.name: Dosage

localizedDescriptions.en: The combination of a medication amount and administration timing for a single day, in the context of a medication order or medication management.

annotations.comment: For example: '2 tablets at 6pm' or '20 mg three times per day'. Please note: this cluster allows multiple occurrences to enable representation of a complete set of dose patterns for a single dose direction.

children.aqlPath: /content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat']/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.medication_screening.v1,'Riwayat penggunaan obat metotreksat dan secukinumab screening questionnaire']/data[at0022]/events[at0023]/data[at0001]/items[at0026,'Riwayat secukinumab']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.dosage.v2]

children.name: Dosis

localizedDescriptions.en: The amount of medication administered at one time.

annotations.comment: For example: 1 mg, 1.5 ml, 0.125 g; or 1-2 ml, 12.5-20.5 mg.

Summary of vaccination administration for a single infectious disease or agent, or a group of infectious diseases or agents that are vaccinated simultaneously using a combination vaccine.

localizedNames.en: Apakah sudah pernah dilakukan vaksinasi COVID-19?

localizedDescriptions.en: Status of the primary (or catch up) course of vaccinations.

annotations.comment: This status should be revised if the course has not been completed and the 'Next vaccination due' date or 'Next review due' has passed.

Date of administration of the specified vaccine.

annotations.comment: Can be a partial date, for example, only a year.
